Directions: Cook pasta according to package directions; drain. In a bowl, combine the pasta, beans, tomatoes,,, tomato paste, broth and seasoning. Transfer to a 2-qt. baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees F for 15-20 minutes or until heated through.
Ingredients: 8 ounces uncooked rigatoni or penne pasta
1 (15 ounce) can great Northern beans, rinsed and drained
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1/2 pound reduced-fat smoked turkey kielbasa, halved and sliced
